No tengo demaciadas horas en este juego, pero si las suficientes para decir que es un juego extremadamente desbalanceado, y cualquiera pensaria que en cuestion a que el asesino destroza 100% a los supervivientes como en viernes 13, o insilence, pero no es asi, aqui el que se come los vergazos es el asesino, si te toca un grupo de supervivientes que si sepan jugar y no de los que se se ponen a llorar porque no pudieron darle un paseo al killer como sus youtubers/streamers favoritos, pueden hacer lo que quieran con el asesino
Pero explico el contexto, en este juego es 1 asesino vs 4 supervivientes, el killer solo tiene 1 tarea, matar a los supervivientes, mientras que los supervivientes tienen la tarea de reparar 4 generadores, reparar 1 generador toma al rededor de 40 segundos o cerca de 1 minuto si estas solo, si hay mas supervivientes en 1 motor, lo repararan mucho mas rapido, sin contar que tienen cajas de herramientas, accesorios y perks para reparar aun mas rapido
Pero en cuestion del killer para matar a los supervivientes tiene que colgarlos 3 veces a cada uno, o impedir que los descuelguen, para esto, tiene que seguir a un superviviente, cazarlo, perseguirlo atravez de obstaculos, ganarle esa caza y tirarlo, colgarlo, e ir a buscar a los demas supervivientes, eso toma al rededor de 4 min si el superviviente es medianamente bueno, si el superviviente es alguien que realmente sabe jugar, puede tomar aun mas tiempo, inclusive toda la partida
Pero si el asesino corre tras el mismo superviviente justo despues de que lo descuelguen, lo llaman tunelero, si el asesino se queda esperando a que alguien se acerque en donde tiene colgado a otro superviviente, lo llaman camper
En youtube hay videos donde se ve como en 3:30 minutos, estan reparados 3 o 4 generadores
Pero los supervivientes no dejan de llorar diciendo que los asesinos estan muy rotos, que estan desbalanceando el juego favoreciendo al asesino
Aunque la realidad es que las personas que mas se quejan es quienes no saben jugar a este juego como supervivientes, ya que el matchmaking esta por los suelos, aunque esto no quiere decir que sea culpa del matchmaking a que los desarrolladores no dejan de joder a los asesinos

Played this game for a while, got red rank with survivor, rank 1 with killer, can say, dont play this game if u like to have fun, this game's fun is to be a cunt and ruin other's ppl's fun, cant really say it was worth my money, and i wished i didnt waste my money and time on this sad excuse for a game. Still a pile of shit 300+ hours later(still a pile of shit 800+ hours later)

Pretty fun game and attractive,i play this game for like 100h and i'm prestige 3  on Meg Thomas. Account level 50. 
If u like this game u should by it, by my experience is fun to play i only had this game for a week and 3 days. ( 10 days total).
The comunnity is pretty friendly i only meet 3 toxic guys in like 500+ matches as survivor.

Little bit scary but not too much, many characters as survivor and killer. u can buy DLCs Characters by points in game, u make these points when u level up your dbd account, same as survivor and killer not all characters u can buy but most of all, i think 3 as survivor and 3 as killer u cannot buy it from points in game, u only donate for premium points to get these characters. I had amazin experiences and i meet 3 friends in this game.

What i want to say is u should buy it for the game experience no matter if u are car enthusiasm or something else.

i remember it like it was yesterday, it was a cool summer night. I was working on a generator when blood started spewing from it and from the blood rose up freddy. Scared of what might happen next i stood there looking into his eyes as he did mine, my heart was pounding sweat pouring down my face my knees were weak and my arms were spaghetti i knew if i ran it would be the end so i just stood there staring at him staring at me. What happened next i still have nightmares about. He walked up to me his warm breath on my neck i thought it was all over. I closed my eyes and when i found the courage to open them back up i saw him in the distance moonwalking away from me. I stood there in stunned silence and watched as he mercilessly slaughtered all my friends before my eyes. I can still hear their screams in the distance, tears running down my face i knew i still had to leave i finished the repairs on my generator now all that was left was opening the doors. I ran to the door as fast as i could only to find freddy waiting there clenching his claws beckoning me to come closer. I walked towards him expecting the worse and started opening the gate, i looked to my side and there he was nodding at me and spinning in circles. I powered the gates and ran to safety. I had finally made it to safety but was it worth it... All my friends were dead... My dreams are now clouded with visions of freddy moonwalking around me.... I cant help but think i wouldve been better off if i had been sacrificed with my friends....
This game is a paradox; it teaches you how to have fun while hating every second of it.

Fun game to play as a killer, survivors don't have that much diversity in gameplay compared to killers

It's not a perfect game by any means, but it is a lot of fun if you don't mind a little salt, sweat and that hit when over the other side of that vault while already 10 ft away. Despite the somewhat toxic community, I've enjoyed my time here and have grown a lot as a player. I've also gotten to know so many cool people because of it. 

The learning curve at the beginning can be a bit rough, but if you're interested in investing some playtime you'll be fine. Just enjoy it and see you in the fog!

i hate this game more than i can express in words. but i am mentally ill and spend too much time obsessing over this game to the point where it ruins my relationships!!! i physically cannot stop playing this game, despite it being ruined with every new update. the developers seem keen to improve the graphics of the game so that when the players get fucked over by the mechanics, bugs and general unfun aspects of the game, at least it looks pretty. ghostface doesn't let me kiss him tho v sad.
I like this game. It brings out the worst in people.
